divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard on the stone seating area. I am usually at the fire pit with the telescope watching the planet and stars when this occurred. this object was just there out of no where A very bright white-blue light first traveling from west to east. It then made a sudden direction change to the south. After a short distance made a 90 degree turn back to the east. It then flew a short distance east and the light went from a white-blue to a small orange and out of sight. This thing was amazing. I first thought it was the ISS but it was too early for that sighting and there were too many clouds. This thing was under the cloud ceiling. I will never forget what I saw and the direction changes it made
Summary: Intense white-blue object that made sudden directional changes
